content: I'm also going to be gone for a bit (though not for as long or to anywhere as exciting as Grahame - just to a scout jamboree). I'll be back in commission again sometime on the 14th. I may have intermittent online access, but don't know for sure. And I certainly won't be in a position to fix anything. @James Agnew and @Josh Mandel can assist if there are build environment issues and @Rob Hausam can assist with terminology service issues. If you can all keep it to 5000 posts or fewer between now and then, that'll make catching up easier ;)
Hope you have fun. And hope you have internet :)
I'm back. If you're waiting on something from me, send me a PM.
The World Scout Jamboree in WV? Were you on staff? Love to catch-up. I've been on a few Wood Badge staffs but never a World Jamboree.

Unfortunately, no. It sounds like it was amazing. I was at the Canadian Pacific Jamboree. About 2000 youth. (An order of magnitude less than in West Virginia. :))

At the moment, I do cubs. However,the scout section lead had a health issue, so I volunteered to help. It was a great week.
